effects.tier1: 15 holy damage; R<3 the target is soulbound (save ends)
effects.tier2: 20 holy damage; R<4 the target is soulbound (save ends)
effects.tier3: 24 holy damage; R<5 the target is soulbound (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A soulbound creature can't benefit from edges or double edges, and can't gain or use surges.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The area is difficult terrain until the start of Psyche's next turn At the start of each of her turns, Psyche can use a maneuver to maintain this effect, move the area up to 5 squares, and make the power roll against each creature in the area's new location.
Until the start of Psyche's next turn, if this ability makes a creature weakened, that creature is also soulbound (save ends; see Soulbind above).

items.name: Command the Awakened
items.target: Each soulbound enemy in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target takes 5 damage from a self-inflicted wound, and if they have M<4 Psyche slides them up to 5 squares.

items.name: Spirit Form
items.trigger: An enemy moves within 2 squares of Psyche.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Psyche moves up to 5 squares, and has damage immunity 5 and ignores difficult terrain during this movement. The first time she moves through any creature during this movement, that creature takes 5 corruption damage.

items.name: Vengeance for the Slain
items.trigger: A war dog within distance is made winded or reduced to 0 Stamina.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The target loses all their surges and takes 5 corruption damage.
The target also takes a bane on their next strike.

When Psyche is reduced to 0 Stamina, her spirit surrounds the nearest war dog, who has damage immunity 2, deals an extra 5 damage on strikes, and can use the following Immortal Flare maneuver until the end of the encounter. That war dog also gains the Immortal Soul trait, and transfers this effect to the nearest war dog when they die.
